This should be one paragraph.

If soft tabs are enabled, this is a space (" ") times the {.getTabLength} value. Otherwise, it's a tab (\t).

This is a paragraph with a br.

Equality is based on some condition.

doc.comment:
This is two seperate paragraphs.

Equality is based on some condition.

Here I am, still yapping.

And I'm done.

Compares two objects to determine equality.

Equality is based on the condition that:

  • the two {Buffer}s are the same
  • the two scrollTop and scrollLeft property are the same
  • the two {Cursor} screen positions are the same
doc.summary: Compares two objects to determine equality.
